pages.text: The Livyatan is a fearsome axe that is capable of freezing its enemies and shattering them for incredible damage. With each strike, the axe may send out a wave of freezing energy that engulfs nearby targets, preventing them from moving completely.

If the wielder wills it, the axe shatters them into pieces, dealing devastating damage. The axe is said to be forged from the heart of a legendary creature and it glows with a cold blue light. This weapon is perfect for warriors who want to deal massive damage and control the battlefield by freezing and shattering their enemies.
